caption.title: GBV-C sequences from H and M-DBS cluster phylogenetically with GBV-C strains from Sierra Leone and Liberia.
caption.p: The longest contig assembled to GBV-C, a 491 n.t. segment, was used as input to create a phylogenetic tree using a neighbor-joining method. The red line corresponds to input sequence generated from NGS data. See S1 Fig for accession numbers corresponding to each GBV-C strain used in the analysis.
